org.lemurproject.ireval

Class IREval

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lemurproject.ireval.IREval

  • public class IREval
extends Object
    A trec_eval style tool in pure java.
    Author:
    Trevor Strohman, Jonathon Hare (jsh2@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

        Loads a TREC judgments file.
        Parameters:
        filename - The filename of the judgments file to load.
        Returns:
        Maps from query numbers to lists of judgments for each query.

        IOException
        FileNotFoundException
